committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Research and Development

official_title: A bill to promote the development of technologies which will enable fuel cells to use alternative fuel sources.
short_title: Renewable Energy/Fuel Cell Systems Integration Act of 1988

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Renewable Energy/Fuel Cell Systems Integration Act of 1988 - Directs the Secretary of Energy to implement a research program regarding: (1) fuel cell use of methane gas generated from biomass forms; (2) technologies using renewable energy sources (such as wind and solar energy) to produce hydrogen for fuel cell use; and (3) fuel cell technology for electric power production as backup spinning reserve components to renewable power systems in rural and isolated areas. Authorizes the Secretary to make grants to, and enter into contracts with, private research laboratories. Requires the Secretary to report to the Congress regarding the fuel cell research program by September 30, 1991. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1990.
